review_title: A Positive Experience at Catholic Health Services
job_title: Integrated Media Manager in Fort Lauderdale, FL
pros: I have been working at Catholic Health Services for almost 16 years now, and it has been an incredibly positive experience. From the moment I joined the organization, I felt welcomed and supported by the entire team. Form my first years with the early childhood education centers to these last years at the corporate office.
cons: There's currently limited room for growth.

job_title: Senior HR Generalist/Recruiter in Miami Lakes, FL
pros: Catholic Hospice is a great company to work for. We have excellent staff members, great management team, great PTO and benefits.
cons: I have not cons at all.

job_title: Recruiter in Miami Lakes, FL
pros: The people. The mission. The values
cons: None at this time :)

job_title: Staff Software Engineer in Miami, FL
pros: Good people to work with
cons: I cannot think of any

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) in Miami, FL
pros: Don't have many people to report to. Everyone is a team player.
cons: Not enough staff. Need more FT nurses.

review_title: can be better the amount of patient is to much
job_title: Nurse Supervisor in North Miami, FL
pros: the salary is reasonable, the benefit is somewhat reasonable, no 401k but the others is somewhat ideal
cons: to much patient to nurse ratio

review_title: Great People to work with BUT No Respect for Pharmacists and their expertise
job_title: Pharmacist in Rockville Centre, NY
pros:
Great work enviroment among employess
Great cafeteria food selection
cons:
Exceptional workers not recognized while those that work under minimal standards are.
Poor management of employees which directly effects poor morale among pharmacists

job_title: Licensed Clinical Social Worker in Westbury, NY
pros:
Sense of Community
Patient care is always first
Team work
cons: Difficult discharge planning at times

job_title: IT Onsite Engineer in Fort Lauderdale, FL
pros: Nice place to work and learn everything about IT
cons: It could be a bit overwhelming

job_title: Recreational Therapy Assistant in Miami, FL
pros: The company does a lot of its employees
cons: No flexibility in schedule but holidays are off

job_title: Registered Nurse in Smithton, IL
pros: everyone is very nice here. small hospital .. everyone knows everyone! makes you feel very comfortable.
cons: organization is not always the greatest. Not many resources overnight.

job_title: Physical Therapy Resident in Miami, FL
pros: flexibility among work sites so not as boring
cons: Productivity standards are very high

job_title: Community Liaison in Hialeah, FL
pros: Location is central, offices are decent, other employees for the most part are good to work with.
cons: The ridiculous company policies make it a pain.  Mandatory flu shots for non clinical staff or you are forced to take a 4 month leave with no pay. Women are not allowed to wear sleeveless garments - not spaghetti straps, ANYTHING that shows your shoulders. Posting on social media about personal beliefs that don't align with their mission are grounds for termination. Insurance is terrible and doesn't cover birth control for women period.  HR dept. is kind of pointless and doesn't take action when needed. They always lose good employees because they don't pay well enough and pile on additional work to the people that stay with no salary bump.

job_title: Director in Melville, NY
pros: Most employees are a pleasure to work with.  Overall atmosphere is pleasant.
cons: Too much politics.  HR almost encourages employees to complain about leadership as they continue to entertain it rather than shutting it down.  Never seems to be enough money for employees (raises, bonuses, percs) but top leadership seems to be able to get anything they want.  The only way to get a decent salary increase is to leave or get a promotion.

review_title: Catholic hospice, good but have potential to be better
job_title: Registered Nurse in Miami, FL
pros: One of the most honest hospice company I ever worked for.
cons: Salary on the low side

job_title: Administrative Liaison in Greenvale, NY
pros: Most staff members are wonderful to work with.
cons: Manager, directors, executive staff been here a long time and continue to operate in an old archaic manner.

job_title: Phelobot in Buffalo, NY
pros: love working with patients and love to put a smile on anyone face.
cons: dont have no cons every day is an learning experience

review_title: Great patients and co workers,but alot of cold hearted personnel in charge

job_title: Registered Nurse in Miami, FL

job_title: Admissions RN in Miami, FL
pros: Feel happy with the environment and co workers.
cons: I don't have an area to work, I drive sometimes from Homestead to Broward.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse II in Orlando, FL
